_comment: COMPREHENSIVE PARAMETER GRID - Use with batch_test_all_traders.py
_comment2: This grid tests EVERY meaningful parameter variation

breakeven_trigger_percent._description: When to activate breakeven stop (% gain from entry)
breakeven_trigger_percent._reasoning: Lower = more protection, Higher = more room to run

trail_method._description: How to trail the stop loss

pullback_percent._description: Fixed percentage trailing stop from peak
pullback_percent._reasoning: Lower = tighter stop (more whipsaw), Higher = more drawdown allowed

atr_multiplier._description: How many ATRs for stop distance
atr_multiplier._reasoning: Lower = tighter stop, Higher = wider stop

native_trail_percent._reasoning: This is the 'airbag' - last resort protection

psar_enabled._reasoning: Works better for trending markets, less useful for scalping

psar_start._reasoning: Lower = slower start, Higher = faster acceleration

psar_increment._reasoning: How much to increase acceleration per bar

psar_max._reasoning: Cap on how aggressive PSAR can get

rsi_hook_enabled._reasoning: Exit when RSI hooks from overbought/oversold

rsi_overbought._reasoning: Exit calls when RSI exceeds this and hooks down

rsi_oversold._reasoning: Exit puts when RSI drops below this and hooks up

_total_combinations_calculation._practical_note: The script intelligently prunes impossible combinations
